title: Top 10 Maduro Cigars – Which Is Best?
itunes:title: Top 10 Maduro Cigars – Which Is Best?
description:
Broadcasting LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… This week we count down the Top 10 Best Maduro cigars according to each of us and in the end… we will have determined once and for all what the best are. It’s time to get Dark as we smoke Maduro’s. In the first hour we will like up a cigar from the care package the Jose Dominguez Maduro.

 

In the second hour of the show we will light up a Liga Privada No. 9 as we continue the discussion and announce a winner from cigar bingo. We will also go back in time and discuss cigars that were once on the market in a Maduro wrapper to see if any are worthy an honorable mention.

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

 

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
